attributes.action: stop freely sentencing people to jail and look more to part paid work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to many people are being sent to prison for minor offences prison is not always working, and some should not be there as there is an un wonted education inside prison, especially for those that have done lesser crimes, there for i would like to see less people sent to prison and instead sent to do   work for many this will be worse than prison its self and also for many it will re educate them and some may find a legal job they like more and there for will pursue creating less crime that jail sentences presently do, there for we need to get people doing full time work with part time wages untill there sentence is over and then a follow on of that for a period of time were by that person has to remain in work wether paid or unpaid,for a set length of time and only then if they do not comit to that another form of punishment should be saught.
